name: Sonic Riders
description:
Sonic Riders is a racing-arcade game developed by Sonic Team and Now Production. It was originally released in 2006. SEGA published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Sonic Riders is available on PlayStation 2, Xbox, GameCube and PC.
It was produced by Takashi Yuda. Kenjiro Morimoto directed the game. Fumie Kumatani, Kenichi Tokoi and Tomonori Sawada scored the game.
